function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Increased use of voice-activated interfaces may contribute to the spread of contagious diseases by facilitating surface contact.","Impact":"Higher risk of disease transmission and potential outbreaks within the built environment.","Mitigation":"Regular disinfection of voice-activated devices and promotion of alternative non-touch interfaces.","Technologies":"Voice-activated interfaces with self-cleaning capabilities, touchless sensors for interaction.","People":"Building occupants, visitors, and maintenance staff.","Owner":"Building owners, facility managers, and technology providers."},{"Description":"Inadequate spatial arrangements and movement restrictions may lead to crowding and increased transmission of contagious diseases.","Impact":"Heightened risk of disease transmission due to close proximity and limited physical distancing measures.","Mitigation":"Implementing flexible spatial designs, clear signage for navigation, and strict occupancy limits.","Technologies":"IoT sensors for monitoring occupancy, interactive digital signage, dynamic space configuration systems.","People":"Building occupants, visitors, and event attendees.","Owner":"Architects, interior designers, building managers."},{"Description":"Use of antibacterial fabrics and finishes may lead to a false sense of security and reduce adherence to proper hygiene practices.","Impact":"Decreased awareness of the importance of personal hygiene and disinfection, leading to potential disease transmission.","Mitigation":"Education on hygiene best practices, regular communication on the limitations of antibacterial materials.","Technologies":"Smart sensors for monitoring hand hygiene compliance, interactive educational displays on hygiene.","People":"Building occupants, cleaning staff, and facility management.","Owner":"Health and safety officers, building management teams, and educational institutions."}]}
